Highlights.description: The document talks about a company named Skilld that helps businesses train their staff in tech skills [1]. Highlights.name: AI-powered Interview Practice Tool
Highlights.description: In addition to upskilling employees, Skilld also offers a free AI tool called InterviewHero that helps individuals practice their interviewing skills [1]. This can be a valuable resource for people who are preparing for job interviews.

Highlights.name: Focus on Online Learning
Highlights.description: The article mentions that Skilld uses a blend of online training to deliver its courses [1]. This can be convenient for learners, as it allows them to complete the training at their own pace and schedule.

enhanced_description: Millionlights specializes in scalable workforce development programs designed to bridge the skills gap, particularly within the tech industry. Operating in a hybrid model across the UK and India, the company partners with large enterprise clients to enhance their workforce's technical capabilities. This includes an online academy providing tech training, and a new AI-powered platform for personalized upskilling of engineering teams. As a Microsoft partner, Millionlights also facilitates talent creation and recruitment through a dedicated B2B SaaS platform for hiring tech talent emerging from their bootcamps, enabling partners to focus on core competencies while addressing their talent needs.
